sentences.en: An intense inferno, reaching temperatures of 2500 F will quickly engulf the aircraft.
sentences.cn: 高达2500华氏温度的火焰很快地吞噬整个飞机.

sentences.en: Be like an island that no flood can engulf.
sentences.cn: 做不被洪水吞没的岛屿.

sentences.en: Desire, could engulf our feeling, sense, even everything sometimes.
sentences.cn: 欲望, 有时候会吞噬我们的情感 、 理智 、 甚至是一切.

sentences.en: despair so great it threatened to engulf him
sentences.cn: 几乎要将他压垮的绝望情绪

sentences.en: Floodwaters engulf a housing project in the Bajo Yuna community in central Dominican Republic.
sentences.cn: 洪水吞没了多米尼加中部巴杰优那社区的一处在建的住房工程项目.

sentences.en: The desert storm is about to engulf you Ride awayride yourselves away.
sentences.cn: 沙漠地风暴会给你带来麻烦,偶地小家伙出发,你自己也得离开.

sentences.en: The desert storm is about to engulf you. Ride away, little boys , ride yourselves away.
sentences.cn: 沙漠的风暴会给你带来麻烦,我的小家伙出发, 你自己也得离开.

sentences.en: The fire spread quickly via stairways to engulf the entire building.
sentences.cn: 大火经楼梯迅速蔓延至整座大厦.

sentences.en: The smallest particles do the most damage, killing macrophages that engulf them in the pulmonary alveoli.
sentences.cn: 最小的二氧化硅颗粒往往会对把微粒吸入肺泡的巨噬细胞造成最大的伤害.

sentences.en: Together with our friends and allies, we will work to shape change, lest it engulf us.
sentences.cn: 同我们的朋友和同盟国一起, 我们会把握形势变化, 以避免我们被吞没.

sentences.en: When waters engulf us we reach for a star.

trans.tran_en: if an unpleasant feeling engulfs you, you feel it very strongly

trans.tran_cn: 吞没，包住，吞食，狼吞虎咽
trans.tran_en: if an unpleasant feeling engulfs you, you feel it very strongly
